author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong Bananza has dozens of styles and outfits for DK and Pauline, some of which are locked to the post-game. In this video, we’ll be going over every style option and outfit to be found in the game.

What You'll Find in This Video:
Every outfit obtained by spending fossils in Style Shops
Bonus outfits to be obtained in the post-game

For more on the individual common fossils of this layer, check out the wiki page: 
https://www.ign.com/wikis/donkey-kong-bananza/All_Unlockable_Clothing_Items

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:07 Neckwear
01:10 Fur Colors
10:13 Britches
14:16 Helmet
14:36 Pauline's Outfits

#IGN #Gaming
title: Donkey Kong Bananza - All Style Options and Outfits (4K)

author: IGN
description:
After a short period of Xbox and PC exclusivity, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl gameplay is finally releasing on PS5, but what extra goodies, if any, can PS5 players expect and how will the performance of Stalker 2 Ps5 gameplay differ to that of Stalker 2 PS5 Pro gameplay? 

In this interview with Technical Producer Yevhenii Kulyk, you can learn all about the way the Dual Sense controller will add extra immersion to the wasteland and how Stalker 2 PS5 gameplay compares to the Stalker 2 Xbox Series editions.

#IGN #Stalker2 #PS5Pro
title: Stalker 2 On PS5 Vs. Xbox - How Different Are They?
